text: John P. Lordon (January 8, 1881 – December 29, 1931) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Liberal party representing Gloucester County from 1925 to 1931. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1870 births Category:1935 deaths Category:New Brunswick Liberal Association MLAs
title: John P. Lordon
